Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending authorization for an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax in the county of Oswego
Summary: Extends authorization for an additional one percent tax rate for sales and compensating use tax in the county of Oswego until November 30, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending authorization for an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax in the county of Oswego
